entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who has a magical eye and is leading the group of wizards on a mission. He grunts and barks orders at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is addressed by Moody and is told to keep close to Tonks' tail while flying in formation.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is introduced as a character who will be flying in front of Harry and is being addressed by Moody.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the one who will be covering Harry from below.

relationships.description: Moody leads the group and gives orders to Harry.
Tonks is flying in front of Harry and he needs to keep close to her tail.
Lupin will be covering Harry from below.
Moody is giving orders to Tonks as well.
